entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: json #57433
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #57432
  • Breaking change for IdentityRole object not documented #57427
    .NET 10 Planning
  • SharedFxTests and TargetingPackTests tests are unable to find ASP.NET Core files on local Linux build #57426
  • ExcludeFromDescriptionAttribute not excluding controller actions from OpenAPI document #57425
    9.0.0
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-preview.7.24407.12] Fail to build the app with error “System.ArgumentException: An item with the same key has already been added.” #57423
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper, fortunes_dapper, updates #57421

Closed

  • Update the baseline for Blazor WASM perf dashboard to .NET 8 #55917
    9.0-rc2
  • Minimal API and OpenAPI: Datetime API Parameter Results In Plain String In OpenAPI Json #46759
    Backlog
  • API description provider not lifting Container type of properties #56764
    Backlog
  • .GetAwaiter().GetResult() limitation in Blazor WebAssembly #57429
  • [Balzor]PersistentComponentState.RegisterOnPersisting(Func<Task> callback, IComponentRenderMode? renderMode) - RenderMode seems ignored #57405
  • Make compiler error instead of runtime against using ChildContent #57391
  • Improve Razor Rendering with Null References #57386
  • Perf improvement: json_middleware #57394
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #57415
  • AddEndpointFilterFactory not working? #53855
  • Problem registering GET routing handler after using routing groups and adding a filter #56511

PullRequests

Created

  • [Templates] Generate single test HTTPS Certificate #57431
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Add explicit conversion for value-type returning handlers with filters #57428
    area-minimal, feature-rdf, area-networking, 10.0-preview1
  • Retry POST_Expect100Continue_Get100Continue #57374
    area-infrastructure, HTTP3, area-networking, 10.0-preview1
  • Quarantine CanSendAndReceiveUserMessagesUserNameWithPatternIsTreatedAsLiteral #57414
    area-signalr, 10.0-preview1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #57434
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0-rc1' => 'release/9.0' #57420
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-rc2
  • Add `StringSyntax` to the `RouteAttribute` #57369
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview1
  • Add hpack decoding test #57221
    pending-ci-rerun, area-networking, 10.0-preview1
  • Propagate PropertyInfo for AsParameters parameters #57264
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 10.0-preview1
  • Forward-port the Virtualize MaxItemCount added in .NET 8 patch to .NET 9 RC1 #57400
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, ask-mode, 9.0-rc1

Updated

  • Fix code generation for parsing optional array parameters in RequestDelegateGenerator #57336
    community-contribution, feature-rdg, area-networking
  • Removing unsafe code in BufferExtensions #57417
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Treating empty string in form post as null for nullable value types #52499
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Upgrade xunit version to 2.9.0 #57303
    area-infrastructure
  • Microsoft.extensions.api description.server allow specifying environment #55836
    area-mvc, area-commandlinetools, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Allow cascading value subscribers to get added and removed during change notification #57288
    area-blazor, * NO MERGE *, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
